scripts.test: multi='spec=- xunit=xunit.xml' istanbul cover -x 'test-helpers/fake-oracledb/*.js' -x 'coverage/*' -x '**/*-spec.js' -x 'test-helpers/*' --report lcov --report cobertura _mocha -- --reporter mocha-multi --require ./test-helpers/mocha-helper.js ./test-helpers/sinon-helper.js ./test-helpers/oracledb-helper.js $(find . -type f -name '*-spec.js' ! -path '*/node_modules/*' )
